responses: Hello! Welcome to our car auction platform.

Greetings! How can I help you with buying or selling today?

patterns: I want to sell my car
How do I list my vehicle?
responses: To sell your car, click the 'Sell' in the navigation bar. You'll need to submit photos and details for approval.
Listing is easy! Just submit your car's VIN and photos. Our team will review it shortly.
We are looking for cool, enthusiast cars! Submit yours via the 'Sell' page to get started.

patterns: How do I buy a car?
responses: To buy, you first need to register and add a valid credit card. Then you can place bids on any live auction.
Bidding is simple! Register an account, find a car you like, and place your bid.
You can bid on any live listing. If you win, we'll connect you with the seller to finalize the deal.

patterns: How much does it cost to list?
responses: Sellers list for FREE! Buyers pay a 4.5% fee on top of the final sale price (capped at $4,500).
Listing is completely free for sellers. Buyers pay a 4.5% buyer's fee, with a minimum of $225 and a maximum of $4,500.
No fees for sellers! Buyers pay 4.5% of the winning bid.

patterns: Can you ship the car to me?
responses: We partner with reliable shipping carriers. You can get a shipping quote directly on the listing page.
Yes, we can help arrange shipping! Check the 'Shipping Quote' calculator on any auction listing.
Shipping is available for all cars. The cost depends on distance and vehicle type.

patterns: What happens if reserve isn't met?
responses: A reserve is the minimum price the seller will accept. 'No Reserve' means the car sells to the highest bidder regardless of price.
If a reserve isn't met, the high bidder gets first dibs to negotiate with the seller.
Some auctions have a reserve price hidden to bidders. If it's 'No Reserve', the highest bid wins!
You can reach our support team at support@carsandbids.com (example).
Need help? Email us at hello@example.com.
